title: Why do I see “Unable to purchase <my-product-id>” in the Android log for Google Play for only consumable products?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am getting the error “Unable to purchase <my-product-id>”.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are receiving the error “Unable to purchase <my-product-id>” when attempting to purchase a consumable product via Unity IAP and Google Play. One reason you may see this message for consumables after some consumable purchase(s) is if the game does not consume the consumable by returning PurchaseProcessingResult.Complete after a purchase.

sections.title: ResolutionPlease ensure that PurchaseProcessingResult.Complete is called after a purchase is made successfully.
